pages.title: Basic Essences
pages.text: $(br)You may have noticed that spells have a chance to drop some $(key)basic magical essences$() when they $(bold)hit$().$(br2)$(key)Basic essences$() are important materials on a mage's journey. They are used to craft magical items such as $(mage/book)spell books$(), $(mage/rune)runes$(), and $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$().

$(br2)The drop chance for $(key)basic essences$() is $(bold)20%$(). Each $(mechanic/loot_charm)Loot Charm$() you wear increases it by $(bold)10%$().$(br2)When the target's $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility level$() is above $(bold)160$(), it has a chance to drop $(bold)Intermediate$() essences.$(br2)When the target's $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility level$() is above $(bold)560$(), it has a chance to drop $(bold)Advanced$() essences.

pages.title: Enchanted Essence
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Enchanted Essence$() can infuse an item with magic, increasing some of its attributes.$(br2)Each time you use $(key)Enchanted Essence$() on an item, the item's $(bold)enchant level$() increases by one.$(br2)$(key)Enchanted Essence$() can only affect an item when its $(bold)threshold$() is greater than or equal to the item's $(bold)enchant level$().

$(br)How to obtain:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Basic essences$() (Novice/Intermediate/Advanced) can be crafted into $(key)Enchanted Essence$() with $(bold)thresholds$() of $(bold)10/20/30$() respectively.$(br)$(list)The maximum $(bold)threshold$() of $(key)Enchanted Essence$() found in loot depends on your $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility difficulty level$().$(br)$(list)In the $(mechanic/difficulty_tier#nightmare)Nightmare difficulty tier$(), you can manually $(bold)merge$() $(key)Enchanted Essence$() to obtain a higher-$(bold)threshold$() $(key)Enchanted Essence$().

pages.title: Enlightening Essence
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Enlightening Essence$() is similar to $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$(). The difference is that $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() affects $(bold)items$(), while $(key)Enlightening Essence$() affects the mage $(bold)directly$() and is not limited by a $(bold)threshold$().$(br2)$(key)Enlightening Essence$() cannot be crafted; it can only be obtained from loot.

pages.title: Mending Essence
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Mending Essence$() fully repairs an item and removes its accumulated $(bold)repair penalties$().$(br2)$(key)Mending Essence$() cannot be crafted; it can only be obtained from loot.

pages.title: Disenchanting Essence
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Disenchanting Essence$() can $(bold)transfer$() all the magic infused into an item by $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() to another item.$(br2)$(key)Disenchanting Essence$() can be crafted, or purchased from Goblin Traders.
